title: Do NOT click the new ward skin
body: I just updated lol , and i found this new thing called ward skin, out of curiosity i clicked that. Guess what, my game freezes, now i'm banned for 5 min.

replies.body:
Hi Guys,

We've disabled the in-queue Ward Skin selection in Oceania due to this issue. 

We've identified the cause of the problem and are currently working on getting a fix rolled out -[ we'll keep you updated when there's more information! ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)
AWwwwww JEAAAH son.

Hi Guys,

If you've experienced this problem can you please provide the following information:

* What queue were you in when it occurred?
* Do you own ward skins, and if so, an estimate of how many?
* Does this happen again if you try again in a custom game?

This should help us to track down the cause of this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sUEQWzGs,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-05T22:58:36.673+0000)
>
> Hi Guys,
> 
> If you've experienced this problem can you please provide the following information:
> 
> * What queue were you in when it occurred?
> * Do you own ward skins, and if so, an estimate of how many?
> * Does this happen again if you try again in a custom game?
> 
> This should help us to track down the cause of this issue.

I was on ranked, I don't have any ward skin. Probably not gonna click on it again anytime soon lol.

Thanks for the extra info! 

It'd be great if you could send us through your logs so we can trace down the root cause of the problem.

All you need to do is click the ? button in the launcher (see attachment if you can't find it), and then click save logs. This will ask you to save a gz file containing all your logs.

Once you have that file, please sent it through to ocelivereports@riotgames.com and then we can use them to get more info!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sUEQWzGs,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-08-06T00:55:53.616+0000)

that is a really old patch lol, did you like pull this image off the desktop of some computer? (when I am prepping online content for my radio segments I have images littered all over the desktop that I never clean lol!)
Luckily the layout hasn't changed much since - no need to reinvent the wheel this time. :)

3.6mb coming at you right now

The problem comes in where this interface doesn't have the usual 'cancel' button after ~30seconds which other interfaces have when loading is slow. (Just as an example, when you join a queue note that brief loading interface which pops up for 1-2 seconds, a cancel button then appears on it if you/the server is lagging massively and the request is taking an extremely long time.)


What queue were you in when it occurred? Ranked solo queue.
Do you own ward skins, and if so, an estimate of how many? No, 0.    
Does this happen again if you try again in a custom game? Yes. An interface comes up saying an unexpected error occurred, then the loading screen (as pictured in my other post) stays after you click to close the error interface.

Thanks for your detailed response - it's really a big help tracking down this issue!

It'd be great if you could send us through your logs so we can trace down the root cause of the problem. 

All  you need to do is click the ? button in the launcher (see attachment if you can't find it), and then click save logs. This will ask you to save a gz file containing all your logs. 

Once you have that file, please sent it through to ocelivereports@riotgames.com and then we can use them to get more info!

copy paste op

What queue were you in when it occurred? BLACK MARKET BRAWLERS
Do you own ward skins, and if so, an estimate of how many? YES, I OWN 2: BATTLECAST and MECHA
Does this happen again if you try again in a custom game? NOT SURE, DIDN'T TRY
Another observation: I had NOT yet selected a Champion before clicking the ward skin.

I just had the same thing just after patching.
I have 2 accounts so im not 100% 
I clicked on ward skin and it said it experienced a problem then just: got stuck on a loading page overlay and I couldn't select rest of bans or champ.

RANKED:  OCE was Queue
WARDS:  0 On this account I thought I had a silver 1 or 2 awarded to me and a tree it might be my other account so on this I have 0 from when I went and checked.
CUSTOM GAME: yes as soon as I click on the ward skin it pulls up a error

Same happened to me a minute or 2 ago.

Ranked queue
Don't own any ward skins
Yes happens in custom game

Good to hear you guys are on the case!

Made this mistake, gg 1 promo game... Lmao.
Can I get that back rito? pls?
(posting on diff account, was on Thorlakr)

Edit: Won promos still! Went 2-0 after that 1 _loss_ from _dodging._

gg 1 promo game lmao.
Seriously don't understand how the hell this feature wasn't ever tested before being added into the game, that's seriously disgusting on Riots behalf.
Used to work right on PBE, i don't get wtf is happening to you.

(possibly wrong?) It'd work if the server behind it was more stable, it seems to be failing as it can't manage to load the content related to ward skins when you click the button, therefore giving an error. Usually in this case after about 30 seconds a little 'cancel' button pops up which you can quite easily click in order to close the interface, this however isn't the case with the ward skin interface.

tl;dr: My theory: lagg in server behind ward skin content (splash arts?) = interface sticks open without a cancel button coming up like usual loading interfaces.


Edit: Apparently the bug is more apparent with those who have no ward skins (100% repeatable in that situation), this may indicate maybe it's trying to load a nonexistent file due to there being no skin splash-arts to load?
Doesn't really makes sense for that to be server-related, at most you could call it server-wide.
so the button just came back up, and i still get locked in the screen lol. gj riot, 3 of my games dodged now

Yep I did the same thing.....How hard is it to test clicking a button??????
Thanks Rito for the easy ELO lose.

Happened on Ranked que. I own no Ward Skins

> [{quoted}](name=Noobasaurus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sUEQWzGs,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-08-06T01:00:37.444+0000)

People on the PBE reported that nothing was wrong with it at the time of testing so obviously something went wrong when they threw it onto live! (possibly incorrectly adapted to the sever and cannot be accessed)
Oh well....I'll live....just ;)
I had someone saying this was happening in champ select but I can click it with no issues.
Can confirm, the same thing just happened to me. I own no ward skins btw.
Rito pls.... disable this shit.

I clicked the ward also, thinking that it would be like the old summoner spells where you could chop and change before your turn to select a champion came up. 5 minute ban. I agree with Noobasaurus, where is the testing??

Hey i keep getting put in the low prio que because of bugs. Today in the champ select the new Hud came up and i noticed the ward skin Icon.

I clicked on it and the game sent off a bug report but the report crashed and caused me to time out so i couldent select any champs or click anything. Just a loading bar in the middle of the screen.

Since i exit the champ select without choosing a champ (because of the bug) i got put in a low prio Que. 10 Mins later i got onto the champ select again and MISS CLICKED THE SAME BUTTON since it was next to the summoner spells. The same thing happend so i closed down the client and re opened it. But because i "dodged the ranked que" i got put into another low prio que for 20 mins.

I understand why the low prio Que is there but why does an automated system not take into account the condition of the client to search for reasons WHY it was closed down and re opened. This is a fix that i feel should be very much considered to avoid un reasonable punishments.

Same here.
In ranked solo queue, clicked the new ward skin box because yolo, 
Unknown Error box appears, I click Ok, then the waveform loading bar appears, and i time out and get banned. 
I don't own any ward skins.
Same thing happened in a normal Custom game.
Lel I just posted before I read this
i just had this too!

Wow my promos..... 

The details are as follows:

I was in ranked queue when it occurred
I own NO ward skins
YES
Same.. Very frustraiting..
Same thing happened to me. If you have not already selected a champion when it happens, you are unable to click anything and end up dodging after the timer runs out
just because of this. i'm going to click that button
